#include <stdio.h>

int main(void) {
	int t, n;
	long long product, num;
	scanf("%d", &t);
	while (t--) {
		scanf("%d", &n);
		product = 1;
		while (n--) {
			scanf("%lld", &num);
			product = (product % 1000000007) * (num % 1000000007);
		}
		printf("%lld\n", product % 1000000007);
	}
	return 0;
}
